text:
Hey Sam,
Great to hear the project is going well! When is your final deadline for this? Best of luck!
Awesome, I can be free for a chat between 1-2pm or 8-9pm Mon-Friday - but Tuesdays or Wednesdays are the more ideal days. Please let me know if you can fit in with any of those times/days.

I'm going to be unavailable on here from 6pm tonight (18/04) until 9am Tuesday (23/04) for the Easter break. Sorry about this! If you have any questions please feel free to send them over anyway, I just won't get to see them until I log back in.
Are you doing anything nice for the break? The weather is supposed to be beautiful, I'm very excited!! :sunglasses::palm_tree::beach_with_umbrella:

Hey! that's great that you are having a break! I am enjoying my finally (I handed in my animatic last friday!). I am just chilin at home this week, trying to organize little since I moved recently and didn't get a lot of time to do that properly. I do have a trip soon to visit my aunt and uncle in Cardiff which I am really excited about because I get to truly rest and disconnect for a few days.

I leave next Wednesday morning so I think Tuesday would be great to have our first chat session. 8-9pm is best for me. I will take my laptop with me though (don't really want to disconnect completely hehe), so no problem with still keeping in touch through here too. I am also very excited for the weather getting warmer finally! I definitely missed it!
I think I will leave most of my questions for our chat next week so don't worry, I really hope you have fun and enjoy your break!

Fantastic - have an amazing time! Sounds lovely spending some time in Cardiff, make sure you get a good rest :blush:
I look forward to catching up with you 8pm on Tuesday 23rd!! (not a problem if you need to cancel/reschedule nearer the time, just let me know) :+1::+1:
